results.content:
Bisher (1-5) gute und einfache Anleitung zum Erstellen der Arbeitsumgebung.
Mit aktuellem Windows 10 v1909 Schwierigkeiten mit geänderten PATH Eintragungen für Heroku, manuelle Eintragung erforderlich.
Diverse Unterschiede zum Video, aber bisher alles lösbar (mit Web-Hilfe).
results.content_html:
Bisher (1-5) gute und einfache Anleitung zum Erstellen der Arbeitsumgebung.

Diverse Unterschiede zum Video, aber bisher alles lösbar (mit Web-Hilfe).

results.content:
Exactly what I was looking for to very quickly get the basics of Rails. A teeny bit of previous knowledge is nice (particularly of Ruby itself), but not strictly necessary. Makes it easy to get up and running and understand the basics. Succinctly explains each step; fast-paced but not hard to keep track of.

Not quite five stars just because I do wish there was a *little* more explanation on how Rails actually works in some spots though. Also, there's a little bad-practice HTML in the course, but that's a minor quibble.
results.content_html:

results.content:
The 1st RoR course I managed to finish. Just wish the pace could be slower, especially when it comes to copying and pasting code from 1 place to another (more technical stuffs that is). Thanks, John for the tutorial. 
p.s. for total beginners - do pick up on Bootstrap and some CSS before you begin - otherwise, you be lost. I guarantee cha' :)
results.content_html:

p.s. for total beginners - do pick up on Bootstrap and some CSS before you begin - otherwise, you be lost. I guarantee cha' :)

results.content: I look for John Elder's courses. I love his teaching style. His explanations are thorough yet concise. Teaching pace is really good for me. I am learning a great deal from his courses!
results.content_html: I look for John Elder's courses. I love his teaching style. His explanations are thorough yet concise. Teaching pace is really good for me. I am learning a great deal from his courses!

results.content: Having been a fan of John Elder and his teaching for some time it is always a pleasure to learn from him. If you're looking for to learn Ruby on Rails brushing up with this Ruby on Rails To-Do List will help you become familiar with some of the tools that modern Rails programmers use. Thank you.

results.content: It's really easy to understand his lecture. I had two Ruby on rails courses, after I saw a short video in Youtube I got enrolled. I recommend this course for all, who is new in Rails like me.
